Container.Name: PS2smb
Container.Overview:
With this container you can share over the network your PlayStation 2 games stored on your PC or NAS to be opened by OPL (OpenPS2Loader) can open them.
You will find the Samba configuration file "smb.conf" in the github repository of this image (https://github.com/FoRTu/docker-ps2smb/blob/main/smb.conf)
